member.name: M:Task1.Population.GetYears(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the number of years it takes a population to exceed currentPopulation.
member.returns: Number of years it takes a population to exceed currentPopulation.
member.exception: Thrown when initial or current population is less than or equal to 0 or when the number of annual visitors is negative.
Thrown when annual growth percentage is less than 0% or greater than 100%.
